analyzed: don de de ring 'grub gyur cig ;rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /
translated: May you two-legged beings be well.

original: rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /
analyzed: rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /
translated: May you four-legged beings be well.

original: khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /
analyzed: khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /
translated: May you all have a good journey.

original: phyir 'ong rnams kyang bde legs shog /🔽nyin @248a *// mo bde legs mtshan bde legs //
analyzed: phyir 'ong rnams kyang bde legs shog / nyin @248a *// mo bde legs mtshan bde legs //
translated: May those who return also have a good journey.🔽May you have a good day and a good night.

original: nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing //
analyzed: nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing //
translated: May you have a good day at midday.

original: khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /
analyzed: khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /

original: khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /🔽sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis //
analyzed: khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig / sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis //
translated: May you not commit any evil.🔽The Buddha, surrounded by a thousand gods,

original: yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyi //
analyzed: yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyi //

original: sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /
analyzed: sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /
translated: May those with hostile minds disperse.

original: snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod //
analyzed: snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod //
translated: May those with compassionate natures remain.🔽By the true words of the Buddhas, the Pratyekabuddhas,

original: sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis //
translated: and the Arhats and their disciples,

original: 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams //
analyzed: 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams //
translated: may those who do harm to the world

original: grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig /
analyzed: grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig /

original: sems can kun dang srog chags kun //
analyzed: sems can kun dang srog chags kun //
translated: May all beings, all living creatures,

original: 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun //
analyzed: 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun //
translated: all elementals, and all of you

original: bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /
analyzed: bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /

original: thams cad nad rnams med par shog ;kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /
analyzed: thams cad nad rnams med par shog ;kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /
translated: May all be free from illness. May all see only good things.

original: gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /
translated: May nothing be a source of evil.

original: 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing //
analyzed: 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing //

original: sa dang bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams //
analyzed: sa dang bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams //
translated: and dwell on the earth and in the atmosphere,

original: skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /
analyzed: skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /
translated: may they always be loving toward all beings.

original: nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /
translated: May they practice the Dharma day and night.

original: 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po rdzogs so //
translated: The Great Sūtra of Entering the Womb is complete.
